'''Walda FreyÂ '''is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''. She is a grandniece of Lord [[Walder Frey]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, many members of [[House Frey]] name their daughters WaldaÂ in an attempt to please Lord Walder. However, there's no mention of any grandniece of Lord Walder. There's also no mention of any siblings.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
WaldaÂ is a grandniece of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 1]]===
While waiting outside [[the Twins]], [[Robb Stark]] has [[Theon Greyjoy]] shoot down any [[ravens]] sent out to prevent Lord Walder from alerting the [[House Lannister]] of his army's movements. One raven turns out to be carrying a birthday message to Walda, though Theon speculates it may be a coded message with some other significance.<ref>"[[Baelor]]"</ref>
